# allowsRecalibrationForEstimates

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether HealthKit supports recalibrating the prediction algorithm used to produce estimates for this sample type.

## Declaration

```swift
var allowsRecalibrationForEstimates: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

To recalibrate the data for this sample type, call the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKHealthStore] class’s [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKHealthStore/recalibrateEstimates(sampleType:date:completion:)] method.
title: allowsRecalibrationForEstimates
